resources.string: Enable spoofing for specific features within the ROM
Enable two-button or three-button navigation to use this feature
Press on color below to apply
Choose the default behavior when connected to a device via USB
Display navigation bar at bottom of screen.\nDisabling will turn off nav gestures. Visit Gesture settings to hide the pill itself
Display left and right cursor buttons while typing. Overrides IME switcher
Use a compact layout in the navigation bar
Inverts the layout of the navigation bar and other items, such as the IME switcher
Choose which system navigation style to use
Feel free to drop by our website

Evolution X is a custom ROM that aims to bring a Pixel feel to your device at first glance. With additional configurations at your disposal, we provide builds with monthly security patches from the latest Android sources.
Maintainer Relations Staff/Evo X Telegram Moderator

Remove the screenshots and screenrecords limits for all applications. Can be convenient in some cases but may lead to privacy leaks. Need to restart applications for the change to take effect.
Displays a heads-up notification in the style of iOS\'s Dynamic Island
Show currently playing media as island notification

The Island notification feature, inspired by iOS's Dynamic Island, transforms Android's heads-up notifications into quick-access and compact notification utility.

Island Quick Access Controls includes the following features:
1. Tap island notification to quick answer phone calls.
2. Long press island notification to reject phone calls.
3. Long press island notification to expand the island notification preview.

Smart Pixels is a power-saving feature. Depending on how many pixels you decide to turn off, you could see an improvement in battery life. Note that in some cases it can result in unresponsive areas on the touch screen
Save battery by shutting off extra pixels
Shut off pixels to reduce power consumption
Enable Smart Pixels when battery saver is enabled
Prevents burn-in on OLED devices by shifting pixels every so often
